short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Merge four images into one with a 9:16 ratio.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Image Merger is a simple yet powerful browser extension designed for those who want to quickly merge four images into a single image with a 9:16 ratio. No complicated settings or configurations required; with just a few simple clicks, you can have a perfectly merged image. Ideal for social media posts, creative advertisements, or any other situation that calls for combining multiple images.
